page.title: 20Our Community Policeman.
page.content: Our{Community Policeman}came to our classroom,he was on duty at the time.He always carries a{truncheon, {handcuffs, a notebook}and a{personal {radio.}He can always be contacted on his radio.He can contact his station,Exeter and the head office in London in seconds.A{policeman}wears a special uniform and helmet so that you can easily{recognise}him.Policemen and Policewomen are there to help you.They help find missing children,adults and dogs.They investigate burglaries,theft,criminal damage and accidents.Criminal damage is like breaking a window;theft is like stealing a bike.Accidents can result in{death}and they have to break the sad news to the relatives.He told us{NEVER}to go with strangers.Our community Policeman works in the Copperhouse area.
